markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [My GCash Card is not being accepted by a merchant for payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287172161305-My-GCash-Card-is-not-being-accepted-by-a-merchant-for-payment-What-do-I-do)

- [The ATM did not release any money after withdrawing using my GCash Card](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287261434009-The-ATM-did-not-release-any-money-after-withdrawing-using-my-GCash-Card)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If your GCash Card is lost or stolen, follow these steps immediately:

1. Open the GCash app and [lock your card](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286982495513-Lock-your-GCash-Card) to block any transactions.
2. Once you've done this, [report your lost or stolen card](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ind=normal&tf_360023219534=my_gcash_account__i_want_to_suspend_my_gcash_card_due_to_lost_card&ticket_form_id=360000706713) to keep your funds safe. A customer service representative will contact you within **1-2 business days.**
3. Review your recent transactions to ensure no unauthorized activity has taken place.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I noticed unauthorized transactions in my GCash account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4416637093145)
- [How do I lock my GCash Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286982495513)
- [How do I reset my GCash VISA/Mastercard PIN?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286846758297)
- [How do I deactivate my GCash Card from my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286976308889)
- [How do I transfer my linked GCash VISA/Mastercard Card to a new mobile number?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287312162201)
- [I lost the SIM or phone where my GCash account is registered](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006457043)
